org.jasig.cas.ticket.support

Class HardTimeoutExpirationPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.ticket.support.AbstractCasExpirationPolicy
      • org.jasig.cas.ticket.support.HardTimeoutExpirationPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ExpirationPolicy

    @Component(value="hardTimeoutExpirationPolicy")
public final class HardTimeoutExpirationPolicy
extends AbstractCasExpirationPolicy
    Ticket expiration policy based on a hard timeout from ticket creation time rather than the "idle" timeout provided by TimeoutExpirationPolicy.
    Since:
    3.1.2
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
